1.content: Here are your choices. The male characters of who you will expand their behinds of your choice are from...
1.title: The Start!

122.content: Old show or new show?
122.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks.

1221.content:
So, who's getting the big booty treatment?

One of the titular 'Munks

Their Adoptive father Dave?

Or, Possibly a side character?
1221.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks.

12211.content:
Alvin, the eldest and most energetic brother!

Simon, the second oldest, but, the tallest and nerdiest, brother!

Theodore, the youngest, shortest, and chubbiest, brother!
12211.title: Choose a Brother

122111.content:
Alvin lay back in bed reading a comic he had read over a dozen times now, bored out of his skull. He gave a frustrated sigh as he placed the book on his bedside table. "Whyyy!" "Whyyyy!" "Why is nothing going on today!" The chipmunk wailed into his hands, expressing his grief at the apparent lack of 'action' today. "You know what!?" Alvin said to no one in particular. "I'm gonna do something today!" "You hear that world!!?" Alvin shouted to the heavens! "I will not, nay, I refuse to be bored today!!" Alvin pointed towards the ceiling defiantly, giving it a accusatory and determined glare!

After such a grandiose display, Alvin paused, and deflated slightly. What was he going to do today?
122111.title: Slow Day.

1221111.content:
Alvin bounded down the stairs at a reckless pace, eager to find, something, to relieve him of his bordom. 'Simon has to be working on something interesting' Alvin thought to himself. 'If not, it could still be fun to tease him a little.' Alvin smiled.

Now at the basement door, Alvin slowly and carefully turned the knob, and opened the door, being extra cautious to not make too much noise. After all, what's the point in bugging your little brother if he already knows you're coming?

Alvin moved slowly and methodically down the steps, so that he would not arouse suspicion in his potential target.

When he reached the bottom of the steps, Alvin took a look about his brothers lab, seeing beakers and test tubes neatly organized along a table, a few were marked 'formula' each with a different number, a mini fridge (which he was secretly jealous of.), and a bunch of other equipment he couldn't make out from this distance.

After his cursory glance across the room, Alvin determined his brother...
1221111.title: What else is a big brother to do?

151.content: There are many options to choose from here. So to start, why not try Star Fox?
151.title: Video Games

1511.content:
Who better than the main character?

Star fox himself of course, the main protagonist, if the name of the series wasn't enough to tell you so. Why not give him a nice ass?
1511.title: Star Fox series

15111.content:
Fox was out on a patrol. A rather regular one that him and his arwing had taken many a time, giving him time to just gaze out at all of the stars. Some of them might have meant something, others still shrouded in mystery. They very well might. But Fox was preoccupied with other things. Other thoughts.
"Why... does this bother me so much?" He thought to himself, images flashing before his eyes of what many presumed was his fated to be lover Krystal... though his own feelings on that were undecided. But these weren't fond memories... these were ones that sparked pure envy, the chances he got to get a glimpse at the derriere she had, though somewhat modest, it was so much more than what he had... and he couldn't stand it.
He ran a hand down to feel his own, privacy was one thing that the vastness of space could provide well, sighing as he felt naughty but the flat, boney behind he had always had. Suddenly, a ping shone on his radar. Two actually. One in the direction of a star he'd never explored, and curiously, the other resonating from The Great Fox. Which does he choose to answer?
15111.title: Fox

151111.content:
But it seemed that Fox was more drawn to the mystery than anything at the moment. He was more than confident that he was not the only capable member of his team to handle whatever happened upon the Great Fox... yet just in case.
"Fox reporting in, investigating a mysterious signal in an as of yet unexplored star system" He sent back, not quite over telecoms, more as a saved log for the team to look over should they ever get to wondering where he had gone. He'd rather keep them focused on the matter at hand while he handled this himself.
Soon, the fox approached the star system, two binary stars that orbited rather close together. A spectacular sight to be sure, but that wasn't the main focus... because the signal was defininitely not coming from those stars. His scanners went to identify planets, maybe even planetoids in the system, finding 3 planets and a moon for each one, the signal being identified as he approached.
It was no mystery what he was getting into, the clear signs of civilization all upon the surface of the planet, visible even from space with the cities that dotted the landscape of the actually rather large, green planet. But just as things seemed to go well, the loud blaring of his alarms sounded suddenly, the fox jumping from his seat and gazing around frantically. "Wha-!" was all he could make out, a sudden asteroid colliding with his vehicle and sending him spiralling into the atmosphere of the planet, and it seemed he was going to land...
151111.title: Mystery Signal

1511112.content:
*After Crashing*

Fox grumbled as he pulled out the last remaining and usable equipment from his totaled Arwing.

"Freakin asteroid.", he continued to grumbled as he look around him. He was in a deep forest, the sound of insects and birds could be heard all around him.

As he started to go on a hike in a random direction, Fox...

Choice 1: Encounters a ancient backwater tribe and gets captured by them. Fox finds out that their males have large plump posteriors with wide hips accompanying them.

Choice 2: Accidentally trip and falls on a strange patch of flowers. Later, Fox finds his pants getting unusually snug pretty quickly.
1511112.title: In the wilderness

1512.title: More

15121.title: Undertale | Who?

info.brief_description: Stories involving men from either a franchise or just made up growing huge asses.
info.description:
I make it simple. This story is how a guy of your choosing grows big in the butt in many ways.

Allowed: butt expansion, m/f, m/m, muscle growth, and male/female harems.

Not allowed: character death, gore, gender shifting, and rape.
info.pretty_title: You like your men with big booties?
